Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Following GEM - P , 5 - year progression - free survival was 46 % ( 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) , 30 - 62 % ) and 5 - year overall survival was 59 % ( 95 % CI , 43 - 74 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Chemical |
| --- |
| GEM-P |
| CI |
```
In the given paragraph, the following are the chemical entities:

1. GEM-P (Gemcitabine) - a chemotherapy drug
2. CI (Confidence Interval) - a statistical term used to express the uncertainty of a measurement

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid chemical entities in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical":
